original: Krautmeyer, Nils Erik Herman^, major, flygplatschef, Norrköping, f. 22/3/98 i Falun av översten Adolf K. o. Olga Maria Vidigson. G. 32 m. Elisabeth (Beth) Tamm. Barn: Ulla f. 33i, Hans Göran 36. — Stud :ex. i Falun 16. Fänr. v. Andra livgren :reg. 19, und :löjtn. 21, löjtn. 23, i Dalreg. 28, i flygvapn. 28, kapt. i flygv. 34, major 42. Flygplatsohef i Norrköping o. di-strichef i luftfartsverket 45. RSO, ÖRKHt2kili, ChrXFrM.
translated: Krautmeyer, Nils Erik Herman, Major, Airport Manager, Norrköping, b. 22/3/98 in Falun, son of Colonel Adolf K. and Olga Maria Vidigson. Married in 1932 to Elisabeth (Beth) Tamm. Children: Ulla b. 1933, Hans Göran b. 1936. Completed studies in Falun in 1916. Ensign in the Second Cavalry Regiment in 1919, Lieutenant in 1921, Second Lieutenant in 1923, served in the Dalarna Regiment in 1928, joined the Air Force in 1928, Captain in the Air Force in 1934, promoted to Major in 1942. Became the Airport Manager in Norrköping and District Chief in the Civil Aviation Authority in 1945. Decorated with the Royal Order of the Sword, Order of the Polar Star, and the Order of Vasa.

occupationalStatus.name: District Chief in the Civil Aviation Authority
